actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exemption for purposes of the Federal estate tax from $60,000 to $120,000.

summary.text: Increases the exemption under the Internal Revenue Code for purposes of determining the value of the taxable estate for the Federal estate tax from $60,000 to $120,000. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 2052, 6018(a)(1))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exemption for purposes of the Federal estate tax from $60,000 to $120,000.
